data.title: Bramnick, Rodriguez, Grabas, Arnold & Mangan, LLC
data.meta_description: Carl Salisbury is a New Jersey insurance and commercial litigation lawyer with Bramnick, Rodriguez, Grabas, Arnold & Mangan, LLC. Call today: 866-845-5571.
data.text:
Carl A. Salisbury

Location: Scotch Plains, New Jersey Phone: 866-845-5571

Fax: 908-322-6997

E-mail: E-mail Me

Areas of Practice

Insurance Coverage for Policyholders

Complex Commercial Litigation

Trade Secrets and Unfair Competition

Employment

Carl A. Salisbury has a national reputation as a policyholder lawyer and has devoted more than twenty-five years of his professional practice to the representation of policyholders in claims against their insurance companies. He is “AV”® rated by Martindale-Hubbell and has been listed in The Best Lawyers in America for Insurance Law from 2006 to the present.

In coverage cases in which Mr. Salisbury has served as counsel for policyholders, they have recovered over a billion dollars in insurance proceeds. He has represented Fortune 500 companies, small and middle-market businesses, government bodies, and individuals in complex insurance disputes, as well as in contract, trade secrets, and employment matters.

Mr. Salisbury received his undergraduate degree in History, magna cum laude, from the University of New Hampshire and his law degree from the Wake Forest University School of Law, where he was Managing Editor of the Wake Forest Law Review. He served as a Judicial Clerk for the Hon. Reynaldo G. Garza of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit before entering private practice.
